results.title: Add special import handling for copilot-setup-steps.yml
results.author: Copilot
results.impact_rationale: New feature adding special handling for copilot-setup-steps.yml import; High impact on compilation workflow (compiler_orchestrator_workflow.go, yaml_import.go, import_processor.go); 1393 additions across 41 files; Affects core compiler logic and step ordering; Includes comprehensive tests (3 new test files); Changes affect multiple workflow lock files (33 recompiled); Well-documented with examples
results.urgency_rationale: Created 2.3 hours ago; Not draft (ready for review); Active development with 9 commits, 16 comments, 5 review comments; CI pending but actively reviewed by pelikhan; Feature request with good engagement; Moderate age penalty (new PR)
results.quality_rationale: CI pending; Ready for review (not draft); Excellent description with comprehensive checklist showing all completed work; Includes 3 dedicated test files; Good documentation updates to both source and template files; Active review process (5 review comments addressed); Well-structured with clear examples and technical details; Assigned to maintainer (pelikhan)
results.action_explanation: This is a high-priority feature PR that adds critical functionality for importing copilot-setup-steps.yml with special handling. The PR is ready for review (not draft), has comprehensive testing, excellent documentation, and is actively being reviewed by the maintainer. While CI is pending, the quality of implementation (extensive tests, clear documentation, thorough checklist) and active engagement warrant fast-track review once CI passes. The changes affect core compiler logic and have been thoroughly tested with 3 new test files covering various scenarios.

results.title: Conditionally include campaign routing in dispatcher based on --campaign flag
results.author: Copilot
results.impact_rationale: Feature adding conditional campaign routing based on --campaign flag; Medium impact on init command behavior (init.go, init_command.go, copilot-agents.go); 529 additions, 384 deletions across 14 files; Removes campaign-related files (agentic-campaign-designer.agent.md and 5 campaign workflow files); Improves UX by not creating references to non-existent files; Changes CLI flag handling
results.urgency_rationale: Created 3.6 hours ago; Draft status (not ready for final review); 5 commits but no review comments yet; CI pending; Medium urgency for UX improvement; Assigned to mnkiefer for review
results.quality_rationale: CI pending; Draft status indicates work in progress; Good description explaining the problem and solution; Only 1 test file changed (log_parser_shared.test.cjs - unrelated?); No issue reference; Clear explanation of changes and result
results.action_explanation: This is a solid feature PR improving the init command UX by conditionally including campaign routing only when requested. The PR is still in draft status, indicating it needs more work before final review. Once CI passes and draft status is removed, it should be reviewed alongside other CLI enhancement PRs. The changes are well-documented and address a real UX issue (dispatcher pointing at non-existent campaign files).

batch-feature-cli-001.description: CLI enhancement PRs improving init command and user experience
